title: Havoc Release Date, Time, Where to Watch
description: The Havoc release date and time is right around the corner, and the fans are eager to know when and where they can watch the highly anticipated action thriller movie featuring Tom Hardy. Gareth Evans wrote and directed Havoc and produced it with Hardy and others. The movie revolves around Hardy’s Walker, a detective who […] The post Havoc Release Date, Time, Where to Watch appeared first on ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More.
author: Tamal Kundu
excerpt: Here is everything you need to know about the Havoc release date and time and where you can watch the movie featuring Tom Hardy.
siteName: ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More
text: The Havoc release date and time is right around the corner, and the fans are eager to know when and where they can watch the highly anticipated action thriller movie featuring Tom Hardy. Gareth Evans wrote and directed Havoc and produced it with Hardy and others. The movie revolves around Hardy’s Walker, a detective who sets out to rescue the kidnapped son of a politician. Here’s all you need to know about Havoc’s release date and time. When is the Havoc release date & time? Havoc’s release date is April 25, 2025, and its release time is 12:00 am PT and 03:00 am ET. Check out its release times in the U.S. below: TimezoneRelease DateRelease TimeEastern TimeApril 25, 202503:00 amPacific TimeApril 25, 202512:00 am Where to watch Havoc You can watch Havoc via Netflix. Netflix is one of the biggest streaming platforms in the world, with over 300 million subscribers. A prospective subscriber in the U.S. can select one of the three plans it offers. The standard with ads plan costs $7.99 / month, whereas the Standard plan (without ads) costs $17.99 / month. Further, the Premium Plan costs $24.99 / month. The subscriber has the option of adding extra members in the Standard without ads and Premium plans for an additional cost. What is Havoc about? In Havoc, Hardy’s Walker is a worn-out cop who takes on the criminal underbelly of the city in the hopes of rescuing the son of a politician. Besides Hardy, the movie features Jessie Mei Li as Ellie, Forest Whitaker as Lawrence, Timothy Olyphant as Vincent, Luis Guzmán as Raul, and others. The official synopsis for Havoc is as follows: “When a drug heist swerves lethally out of control, a jaded cop fights his way through a corrupt city’s criminal underworld to save a politician’s son.”
html:
The Havoc release date and time is right around the corner, and the fans are eager to know when and where they can watch the highly anticipated action thriller movie featuring Tom Hardy. Gareth Evans wrote and directed Havoc and produced it with Hardy and others. The movie revolves around Hardy’s Walker, a detective who sets out to rescue the kidnapped son of a politician.

Here’s all you need to know about Havoc’s release date and time.

When is the Havoc release date & time?

Havoc’s release date is April 25, 2025, and its release time is 12:00 am PT and 03:00 am ET.

Check out its release times in the U.S. below:

Where to watch Havoc

You can watch Havoc via Netflix.

Netflix is one of the biggest streaming platforms in the world, with over 300 million subscribers. A prospective subscriber in the U.S. can select one of the three plans it offers. The standard with ads plan costs $7.99 / month, whereas the Standard plan (without ads) costs $17.99 / month. Further, the Premium Plan costs $24.99 / month. The subscriber has the option of adding extra members in the Standard without ads and Premium plans for an additional cost.

What is Havoc about?

In Havoc, Hardy’s Walker is a worn-out cop who takes on the criminal underbelly of the city in the hopes of rescuing the son of a politician. Besides Hardy, the movie features Jessie Mei Li as Ellie, Forest Whitaker as Lawrence, Timothy Olyphant as Vincent, Luis Guzmán as Raul, and others.

The official synopsis for Havoc is as follows:

“When a drug heist swerves lethally out of control, a jaded cop fights his way through a corrupt city’s criminal underworld to save a politician’s son.”
